artist: Artist: Jim Hodges; Publisher: Co-published by Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Co-published by Walker Art Center
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstracted image of reflections on water; colored pencil-like green areas with predominately horizontal shading at top 3/4 of sheet; some light blue, grey and black solid-colored areas primarily in LLQ and ULQ; graphite pencil-like marks and shading at LRQ; applied thin transparent paper along right edge creating milky appearance
markings: LLC in pencil: 23/28 | LLC publisher\'s blindstamp: HP (intertwined; inside a square)
medium: Color intaglio, screenprint, woodcut and pigment on Japan paper with cutouts
signed: LRC in pencil: Jim Hodges 2016 | bottom center in pencil: of Summer (upside down)
title: of Summer
